abstract: Though Apple hasn’t decided whether to carry the Google Voice application, a Ribbit Mobile app offers some of Google Voice’s features.
snippet: Though Apple hasn’t decided whether to carry the Google Voice application, a Ribbit Mobile app offers some of Google Voice’s features.
lead_paragraph: As iPhone users await Apple’s reconsideration of its decision to withhold Google Voice (and the subsequent F.C.C. inquiry), they do not have to go entirely without the features of Google Voice. Many are available through an app called Ribbit Mobile.

headline.main: App of the Week: Mimicking the Features of Google Voice
headline.print_headline: App of the Week: Mimicking the Features of Google Voice
